thread.title: Karen Matthews 'fleeing to SPAIN' after backlash over TV drama The Moorside
thread.title_full: Karen Matthews 'fleeing to SPAIN' after backlash over TV drama The Moorside

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Karen Matthews 'fleeing to SPAIN' after backlash over TV drama The Moorside
text:
Showbiz Karen Matthews 'fleeing to SPAIN' after backlash over TV drama The Moorside The mum-of-seven has feared for her life after being hit with death threats after the first of episode of the BBC two-parter Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Take a sneak peek at Episode two of The Moorside Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Karen Matthews is reportedly planning to move abroad after the backlash over BBC drama The Moorside. 
Just days before the programme aired last week, Karen - who is played by Gemma Whelan in the two-parter - had a pot of steaming mushy peas dumped over her head by a disgusted mum after she left a chippy . Karen Matthews is reportedly planning to move abroad (Photo: Phil Harris/Daily Mirror) It's said she doesn't feel safe after The Moorside airing (Photo: Phil Harris/Daily Mirror) 
Now, a source has told the Daily Star that she has applied for a passport and is eyeing up a cleaning job on the Costa Blanca. 
The source said: "She knows she can never avoid her past. With this programme on the telly she’s realised living abroad might be a better option for her.” Shannon Matthews (Photo: PA) 
Matthews was living in Dewsbury, West Yorkshire, when she hit headlines in 2008 after pretending her daughter Shannon, nine, had been kidnapped. 
The BBC1 show, which continues on Tuesday, reveals how Matthews sat back and allowed police and friends to organise search parties for Shannon for almost a month – knowing she was being held less than two miles away in the dingy flat of her partner’s uncle Michael Donovan. Karen seen in 2008 (Photo: PA) She is played by Gemma Whelan (r) in The Moorside (Photo: Publicity pic) 
Matthews was jailed for eight years after her plot was uncovered, but was released after serving just half her time. 
Donovan, 48, also sentenced for eight years was released a few weeks before Matthews. Like us on Facebook
